y: Kafka's Metamorphosis is one of the most famous novels of all time. The story is about a man who is transformed into a vermin in his bed. It is set in the 1920s and 1930s.

Gregor then turned to look out the window at the dull weather. Drops of rain could be heard hitting the pane, which made him feel quite sad. “How about if I sleep a little bit longer and forget all this nonsense’, he thought, but that was something he was unable to do because he was used to sleeping on his right.
“Oh, God”, he thought, “what a strenuous career it is that I’ve chosen! Travelling day in and day out. It can all go to Hell!” He felt a slight itch up on his belly.

Gregor's alarm clock did not rung as it should have done. He did not feel particularly fresh and lively. If he caught the train he would not avoid his boss’s anger. His boss would accuse his parents of having a lazy son.
